FAQ / Wave 3 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Raider Storm Cloud - Infantry - Electronic Warfare

  1. Can I use Raider Storm Cloud’s ability to give itself bold 3 (or bold 6)? [Source: WotC]
    You can, but remember that using a tap ability causes the character to become tapped. Hopefully it’s a good plan.
